committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States Government should negotiate a multilateral wheat production agreement with the other wheat exporting countries.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should negotiate with the governments of other leading wheat exporting countries to: (1) ensure stable wheat prices through a multilateral wheat production agreement; and (2) eliminate subsidies of commercial wheat exports.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States Government should negotiate a multilateral wheat production agreement with the other wheat exporting countries.
